entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
